name: Futiq Technologies Pvt. Ltd
tagline: Mobile, Web development & Digital Marketing Firm
description:
The word “Futiq” is derived from “Future IQ”. FUTIQ is a global outsourced IT Services company with a strong team of 80+ highly skilled IT experts, catering result oriented and cost-competitive solutions to SMEs across the US, Canada, UK, Europe, Australia and many parts of Europe. Our business is to make the offshore strategy work for ISVs and software enabled companies.
Keeping pace with the rapidly increasing IT outsourcing, the various services that we provide include Website development, Digital Marketing, Software Product Engineering, Bespoke application development, Software Testing services, Mobile Application Development Services and specialized consulting services around products like Alfresco, Liferay, SharePoint, Salesforce and many more. 
We at Futiq strictly believe in our motto “Delivered. What You Desire” and promise to serve our customers with the most innovative, reliable and high quality IT solutions. Our emphasis is on providing unparallel service that empowers our clients to improve their productivity and efficiency.
